text: Pseudodrephalys atinas is butterfly that is commonly found in south east Peru (Amazonian region). It belongs to the family Hesperiidae. ==References== *http://www.ftp.funet.fi/index/Tree_of_life/insecta/lepidoptera/ditrysia/hesperioidea/hesperiidae/pyrginae/pseudodrephalys/index.html#NL4A Category:Pyrgini Category:Butterflies described in 1888 Category:Hesperiidae of South America Category:Taxa named by Paul Mabille
title: Pseudodrephalys atinas
